General.Name: Weihai Guangwei Composites Co Ltd
General.Description: Weihai Guangwei Composites Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells high-performance carbon fiber and composite materials in China. It offers carbon fibers and fabrics, carbon fiber prepregs, glass fiber prepregs, carbon fiber composite products, and other products. The company also provides precision machinery. Its products are used in the defense and military sectors, such as aerospace, electronic communications, weapons and equipment, and other fields; and civil sector, including wind power blades, rail transit, nuclear power equipment, shipbuilding, major infrastructure construction, auto parts, medical equipment, high-end sports and leisure goods, and other fields. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Weihai, China.
